title: Screen WONT MOVE HELP!!!!

embed.description: I am playing on the mac client, and ever since the latest patch, whenever I try to play a custom game I experience an irritating glitch, in which my left click doesn't work unless I double click, and I can't scroll the camera with the mouse, I need to double click on the minimal to move th

body: This has been a problem for about 2 years now will someone plz help... I've seen multiple people complaining about this and no help has been given to anyone

replies.body:
Hey, that's incredible you've been dealing with this for so long.  :(  Your settings may have become corrupt, see if a config reset can help here:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
